screen_desc: The screenshot shows the "Picture-in-picture" settings for the Maps app. It allows the app to create a window in the foreground while the user is on another app, continuing to use Maps. The switch is currently off.
action_think: The user wants to turn off the Picture-in-picture feature. The toggle switch for this feature is currently on, so the next action is to click on it to turn it off.
action_desc: click on the toggle switch of 'Allow picture-in-picture' located at the upper right.
action_result: By clicking the back button, you have accessed the Picture-in-Picture settings for the Maps application, which is relevant for your request to turn off picture-in-picture. This action aligns with your goal to disable this feature for Maps. You have made progress towards completing your request.
prev_action_result: The last action of clicking on the toggle switch of "Allow picture-in-picture" has successfully turned off the feature. This aligns with the user's request to turn off picture-in-picture.
